description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play through 100 levels of strange and subtle pattern matching, ranging from comfortingly slow and simple to surprisingly quick and challenging.  As you progress, you'll uncover an abstract retelling of a vaguely familiar storyline, and, if you're careful and attentive, you might discover you have more control over the plot than you expected.
